QuestData.Title: Lightforged Beacon: City Center
QuestData.Description: Hail, friend!$b$bCaptain Fareeya sent us ahead to secure this area. We were just about to call down a beacon and report back to the Vindicaar.$b$bWe would be honored if you would help us complete our mission.$b$bThe signal beacon just needs a light touch. The Grand Artificer will do the rest.
